page.title: 20FASHION AND BEAUTY
page.content: Much interest is shown in fashion and beauty, pop music and many people imitate the clothing, hairstyles etc. of television and film personalities. There is also a growing number of people who regularly eat out. In nearly every community there are Indian and Chinese food take-aways in many cases replacing the traditional cafe-cum-chip shop. Many public houses are adding on dining rooms with an ever increasing range of menu and restaurants are frequently being opened. In many areas more sophisticated private clubs which cater for gambling as well as drinking and eating at a more basic level the betting shops cater for gambling on horses, dog racing and major sporting events.
